summary: A group of Los Angeles teenagers meet every week at their local diner to discuss their latest misadventures in their miserable lives.
cast: Scott Bloom|Kevin Connolly|Tobey Maguire|Leonardo DiCaprio|Jenny Lewis|Meadow Sisto|Marissa Ribisi|Amber Benson|Andre Berryman|John Brooks|Jeremy Sisto|Jeffrey Connor|Toledo Diamond|Walter Davis|Paula Verise|Kiva Dawson|Wendy Fowler|Zepha Zoe Ober|Marisa Ryan|Jerry Swindall|Stephanie Cambria|Byron Thames|Heather McComb|Phyllis Brooks-Daniels|Branden Morgan|Bethany Ashton Wolf|Robert Zimmermann|Ethan Suplee|Dale Wheatley|Marissa Borsetto|Cool Breeze|Nikki Cox|Traci Burgard|Amy Chance|Alexander Vara
keywords: teenager|diner|low budget film|saturday night|talking to oneself in a mirror
title: Don's Plum
